_Review comment by @AlexWaygood on `crates/ty/docs/.gitattributes`:3 on 2025-05-19 14:53_

you can still see the diff, you just need to click a "show diff for this generated file" button in the "Files changed" tab

---

_Review comment by @dcreager on `crates/ty/docs/.gitattributes`:3 on 2025-05-19 14:54_

And on the command line you can add `-a` to any `git diff` command
